mapper.select: SELECT b.boardNo, b.userNo, b.boardTitle, b.content, b.countLikes, b.boardCount, b.deletedTime, b.writtenTime, b.isReported, b.myCourseNo, u.userNick FROM board b LEFT JOIN user u ON b.userNo = u.userNo where b.deletedTime is null order by b.writtenTime desc limit #{size} offset #{offset}
